code: import{FINISHED_WIN}from"./../constants";var directionDictionary={N:"↑",NNE:"↗︎",NE:"↗︎",ENE:"↗︎",E:"→",ESE:"↘︎",SE:"↘︎",SSE:"↘︎",S:"↓",SSW:"↙︎",SW:"↙︎",WSW:"↙︎",W:"←",WNW:"↖︎",NW:"↖︎",NNW:"↖︎"};var getDayOfYear=function getDayOfYear(){var date=new Date();var timestamp1=Date.UTC(date.getFullYear(),date.getMonth(),date.getDate());var timestamp2=Date.UTC(date.getFullYear(),0,0);var differenceInMilliseconds=timestamp1-timestamp2;var differenceInDays=differenceInMilliseconds/1000/60/60/24;return differenceInDays;};var createShareableResult=function createShareableResult(selectedCountries,game,numGuesses){var resultString="#Worldle Day#"+getDayOfYear()+" "+(game===FINISHED_WIN?numGuesses:"X")+"/6\n";for(var i=0;i<numGuesses;i++){var _selectedCountries$i=selectedCountries[i],direction=_selectedCountries$i.direction,distance=_selectedCountries$i.distance;resultString+=(i===numGuesses-1&&game===FINISHED_WIN?"🎯":distance+" KM = "+Math.round(distance/1.609)+" MI, "+directionDictionary[direction])+",\n";}resultString+="https://worldle-guess.vercel.app";navigator.clipboard.writeText(resultString);return resultString;};export default createShareableResult;
